name: Baldi's Basics 42 Edition
description:
Oh noes! School is out, but your friend has a problem! He left all his noteboos in school, but doesnt have time to go get them, because if he does he'll be late for eating pracitce. To help him out, you have to go back in the school and find all his notebooks for him. It will be easy though! Baldi loves challenging his students with fun trivia problems whenever he can! Each time you find a notebook, you'll have to answer some questions.

To win the game, you must find 7 notebooks, and then exit the school! You have to have fun too, of course!
